faq.question: How do I report a missing person?
faq.answer: You need to log in to your account, then click 'Report Missing Person' and fill in the required details. You can also use this chatbot to access the reporting form.

faq.question: How do I report a sighting?
faq.answer: First, search and select the missing person case. On the case detail page, click the 'Report Sighting' button to submit your information. Please provide as much detail as possible.

faq.question: How do I search for a missing person?
faq.answer: You can search by name or filter by age, gender, or last seen location using this chatbot or from the platformâ€™s main search page.

faq.question: How do I become a volunteer?
faq.answer: Log in to your account, then click 'Become a Volunteer' and fill out the application. You can also browse current community projects to join.

faq.question: How do I earn points?
faq.answer: You can earn points by reporting missing persons, submitting sighting reports, sharing cases on social media, and participating in community projects.

faq.question: How do I redeem rewards?
faq.answer: After earning enough points, go to the 'My Rewards' page and select the reward you want to redeem. Points will be deducted upon successful redemption.

faq.question: Is my personal information safe?
faq.answer: Yes, your information is protected with strong encryption and strict access controls. Only authorized administrators can access your data.

faq.question: Can I report anonymously?
faq.answer: You must register and log in to submit a report, but your identity will only be shared with authorized personnel and not made public.

faq.question: How do I contact support?
faq.answer: You can leave a message here in the chatbot under 'Contact Support,' or email us at support@email.com. Our team will assist you as soon as possible.

faq.question: Others
faq.answer: For any other questions, please use 'Contact Support' in this chatbot or check our website for more information.
